==== declarationEmitExpandoFunction (5 errors) ====
    
    export function A() {
    ~~~~~~
!!! error TS1128: Declaration or statement expected.
        return 'A';
    }
    
    export function B() {
    ~~~~~~
!!! error TS1128: Declaration or statement expected.
        return 'B';

    ~~~~~~

           ~~~~
!!! error TS1128: Declaration or statement expected.
                  ~
!!! error TS1005: ';' expected.

    }
    
    A.a = C;
    A.b = C;
